mapper.insert: insert into codegroup ( ifcgName, ifcgUseNy, ifcgOrder, ifcgDelNy, ifcgDesc, regDateTime, regDateTimeRevise ) values ( #{ifcgName}, #{ifcgUseNy}, #{ifcgOrder}, 0, #{ifcgDesc}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT a.ifcgSeq, a.ifcgName, a.ifcgUseNy, a.ifcgOrder, a.ifcgDelNy, a.ifcgDesc, a.regDateTime, a.regDateTimeRevise FROM newjeans.codegroup a WHERE 1=1 AND a.ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE codegroup SET ifcgName = #{ifcgName}, ifcgUseNy = #{ifcgUseNy}, ifcgOrder = #{ifcgOrder}, ifcgDelNy = 0, ifcgDesc = #{ifcgDesc}, regDateTimeRevise = now() WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
UPDATE codegroup SET ifcgDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
